## relativeHexCoordinate() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get the hex coordinate in one of the six directions relative to the given base coordinate, or on top of that coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function relativeHexCoordinate(coordinate: HexCoordinate, direction: number): HexCoordinate;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The base coordinate, from which the relative coordinate will be calculated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

direction


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The direction relative to the base coordinate. Starting with 1 at the top-right, and proceeding clockwise through 6.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)

The relative coordinate, or the same coordinate if direction is zero.
